title: Binary Representation of Real Numbers
description: In computer science, binary is a numbering system that uses only two digits, 0 and 1. It is widely used in digital electronics and computer systems. In this challenge, we will write a Python program to print the binary representation of a given real number between 0 and 1.

meta.description: Learn how to write a Python program to print the binary representation of a real number between 0 and 1. Explore the requirements and limitations of this programming challenge.
